        *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>
        
          
        <div>
          
        </div>
      <div class="comment-body">
        <mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>
        <div>
          
        </div>
      </div>

          Comment 35<a class="comment-link" href="?id=1219886#c35">Comment 35<!----></a>

          <a class="comment-link" href="?id=1219886#c3">Comment 3<!----></a>

        #analysis<span class="line"><!---->#analysis<!----></span><br>The root cause of this issue is that WebGLMultiDraw::multiDrawArraysInstancedImpl[1] calls WebGLMultiDrawCommon::ValidateArray[2] to check whether the array access in the parameter is out of bounds, but they check drawcount and offset separately without considering the situation of drawcount+offset, resulting in access Out of bounds.<span class="line"><!---->The root cause of this issue is that WebGLMultiDraw::multiDrawArraysInstancedImpl[1] calls WebGLMultiDrawCommon::ValidateArray[2] to check whether the array access in the parameter is out of bounds, but they check drawcount and offset separately without considering the situation of drawcount+offset, resulting in access Out of bounds.<!----></span><br><br>[1]third_party/blink/renderer/modules/webgl/webgl_multi_draw.cc:83<span class="line"><!---->[1]third_party/blink/renderer/modules/webgl/webgl_multi_draw.cc:83<!----></span><br>[2]third_party/blink/renderer/modules/webgl/webgl_multi_draw_common.cc:24<span class="line"><!---->[2]third_party/blink/renderer/modules/webgl/webgl_multi_draw_common.cc:24<!----></span><br><br>#Patch<span class="line"><!---->#Patch<!----></span><br>diff --git a/third_party/blink/renderer/modules/webgl/webgl_multi_draw_common.cc b/third_party/blink/renderer/modules/webgl/webgl_multi_draw_common.cc<span class="line"><!---->diff --git a/third_party/blink/renderer/modules/webgl/webgl_multi_draw_common.cc b/third_party/blink/renderer/modules/webgl/webgl_multi_draw_common.cc<!----></span><br>index e0da2d4c898..36cc36268bf 100644<span class="line"><!---->index e0da2d4c898..36cc36268bf 100644<!----></span><br>--- a/third_party/blink/renderer/modules/webgl/webgl_multi_draw_common.cc<span class="line"><!---->--- a/third_party/blink/renderer/modules/webgl/webgl_multi_draw_common.cc<!----></span><br>+++ b/third_party/blink/renderer/modules/webgl/webgl_multi_draw_common.cc<span class="line"><!---->+++ b/third_party/blink/renderer/modules/webgl/webgl_multi_draw_common.cc<!----></span><br>@@ -34,6 +34,12 @@ bool WebGLMultiDrawCommon::ValidateArray(WebGLExtensionScopedContext* scoped,<span class="line"><!---->@@ -34,6 +34,12 @@ bool WebGLMultiDrawCommon::ValidateArray(WebGLExtensionScopedContext* scoped,<!----></span><br>                                          outOfBoundsDescription);<span class="line"><!---->                                          outOfBoundsDescription);<!----></span><br>     return false;<span class="line"><!---->     return false;<!----></span><br>   }<span class="line"><!---->   }<!----></span><br>+  <span class="line"><!---->+  <!----></span><br>+  if (size - offset < static_cast<uint32_t>(drawcount)) {<span class="line"><!---->+  if (size - offset &lt; static_cast&lt;uint32_t&gt;(drawcount)) {<!----></span><br>+    scoped->Context()->SynthesizeGLError(GL_INVALID_OPERATION, function_name,<span class="line"><!---->+    scoped-&gt;Context()-&gt;SynthesizeGLError(GL_INVALID_OPERATION, function_name,<!----></span><br>+                                         outOfBoundsDescription);<span class="line"><!---->+                                         outOfBoundsDescription);<!----></span><br>+    return false;<span class="line"><!---->+    return false;<!----></span><br>+  }<span         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

           issue<h3 class="medium-heading"><!----> issue</h3>
          
            Target project:<label for="targetProjectInput">Target project:</label>
            
              <input id="targetProjectInput" aria-owns="chops-autocomplete-1" aria-autocomplete="both" aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="listbox" aria-activedescendant="">
              
      
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }
      <style>
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }
      </style>

 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
<script type="text/javascript" nonce="">
 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
</script>
